thread.title: Queer film festival opens in London

title: Queer film festival opens in London
text:
Queer film festival opens in London Wednesday, March 21, 2018 - 01:58 
The ''BFI Flare'' London LGBTQ+ film festival opens Wednesday (March 21) with Lesbian film ''My Days of Mercy'' starring Ellen Page and Kate Mara. ROUGH CUT (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The "BFI Flare" London LGBTQ+ film festival opens Wednesday (March 21) with Lesbian film "My Days of Mercy" starring Ellen Page and Kate Mara. ROUGH CUT (no reporter narration).
